name: Linkwarden
short_description: Bookmark preservation tool for individuals and teams with full-text search and archiving.
description: Bookmark preservation tool for individuals and teams with full-text search and archiving. Linkwarden is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, utility, bookmarks, search. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Linkwarden on your home server to bookmark preservation tool for individuals and teams with full-text search and archiving without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Linkwarden to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
